preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("No", "BMRC MLO", "Sanaa MLO", "Aden MLO", "Gaza MLO", "Self-referral", "Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "PSA, Referrals ordered");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to PSA, Referrals ordered
